fields.value: Attitudes Towards the Family in France, 1969 (M312V1)

datasetContactAffiliation.value: University of California, Los Angeles. Social Science Data Archive

dsDescriptionValue.value: This file contains data on a 1969 survey of French adults' attitudes toward the family, marriage and sex roles.
